title: Equality (as...as)
content: He is as [tall|taller] as his father. She is not as [busy|busier] as I am.
explanationEnUs: Use 'as + adjective + as' to show that two things are equal.
explanationZhTw: 使用 'as + 形容詞 + as' 表示兩事物相等。
explanationZhCn: 使用 'as + 形容词 + as' 表示两事物相等。

title: Parallel Increase (The...the...)
content: The [more|most] you practice, the [better|best] you become. The [sooner|soon], the [better|best].
explanationEnUs: The + comparative ..., the + comparative ... describes two things changing together.
explanationZhTw: The + 比較級 ..., the + 比較級 ... 描述兩事物一起變化。
explanationZhCn: The + 比较级 ..., the + 比较级 ... 描述两事物一起变化。

title: Comparatives with 'Than'
content: This book is [less expensive|less than] than that one. It is [more interesting|interesting more] than the movie.
explanationZhTw: 使用 'more/less + 形容詞 + than' 進行比較。
explanationZhCn: 使用 'more/less + 形容词 + than' 进行比较。

title: Repeated Comparatives
content: The weather is getting [colder and colder|cold and cold]. He is running [faster and faster|fast and fast].
explanationEnUs: Repeat comparatives to show continuous change.
explanationZhTw: 重複比較級表示持續的變化。
explanationZhCn: 重复比较级表示持续的变化。

title: Specific Differences
content: He is [much|very] taller than me. She is a [little|more] older than him.
explanationEnUs: Use 'much', 'a lot', 'far', or 'a little' to modify comparatives. Do NOT use 'very'.
explanationZhTw: 使用 'much', 'a lot', 'far', 或 'a little' 修飾比較級。不要使用 'very'。
explanationZhCn: 使用 'much', 'a lot', 'far', or 'a little' 修饰比较级。不要使用 'very'。
